examples: She did not seem to have any of the usual maternal instincts.
No parecía tener ninguno de los instintos maternos habituales.
Children do not know by instinct the difference between right and wrong.
Los niños no conocen por instinto la diferencia entre el bien y el mal.
His first instinct was to run away.
Horses have a well-developed instinct for fear.
Los caballos tienen un instinto del miedo bien desarrollado.
